title: Toxic people
body: a guy with the name i wont mention (sorry riot i didnt notice this) extremely toxic didnt flame alot, just sold his items and went mobies and fed only 2 kills which was suprising. he died to olaf as renekton had a really bad score. (something like 2/7) blamed my jungler who was ivern for not ganking his lane before olaf was 6. called himself high elo but he lost to a silver 1 olaf. he claimed he was high elo and we were all trash in game a few times. he went afk occasionally and danced around. i must admit i did tell him to killhimself 3/4 of the way he was doing so in game in which i take full repsonsibility and i say sorry. but the fact that riot arent doing much about getting rid of these people is the thing that really annoys me. i get these kind of people probably around 60% of the time and its just ridiculous. riot pull your pants up. these toxic people make others toxic. its like a disease. get your act together if u really care us.

replies.body:
It was just a bad game imo, it didn't feel like he was really in the "toxic" zone but more to do with being "obnoxious". The former is report-able, the latter depends. This guy seems to be walking on the line so Idk.

However, telling others to kill themselves isn't right either. Remember, 2 wrongs don't make 1 right.
plz comment if u agree with me
